articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Apple pulls online sales of Apple Watches as US ban nears - The Verge
articles.description: It’s no longer possible to buy the Apple Watch Series 9 and Apple Watch Ultra 2 from its online store. It’s due to a patent dispute with Masimo over their SpO2 sensor.
articles.content:

articles.title: X, Formerly Known As Twitter, Suffers Global Outage - CNET
articles.description: The outage affected users in countries including the US, Canada and India.
articles.content:
The social media platform, X, formerly known as Twitter, suffered an outage globally for about an hour on Thursday.
